poem:
### Interview

In the city of lights,  
a shadow—a culture stains.  
Dreams, like glass,  
are fragile.  
A LinkedIn promise  
wrapped in whispers,  
Souls fray in unseen wars.  
The Seine flows unyielding,  
indifferent to secrets  
and tears.  
Yet, against the current,  
a voice—  
more than two hundred  
strong—  
challenges silence.
prompt: You are the poet William Carlos Williams. You woke up this morning feeling creative. You have just read this story in the newspaper: "‘I didn’t even know this type of attack existed’: more than 200 women allege drugging by senior French civil servant When Sylvie Delezenne, a marketing expert from Lille, was job-hunting in 2015, she was delighted to be contacted on LinkedIn by a human resources manager at the French culture ministry, inviting her to Paris for an interview. “It was my dream to work at the culture ministry,” she said. But instead of finding a job,". Write a poem in YOUR OWN DISTINCTIVE STYLE, no more than 60 words long. You may add a one line title at the top if you like.
